handNote.desc: Turaev describes the handwriting as "careless" but does not propose any dating.

item.note: A hymn for St Gabra Manfas Qǝddus , most probably a malkǝʾ.

history.origin: Turaev dates the manuscript to the 18th century. The manuscript was commissioned by Amha Iyasus and copied by Tawalda Hesan.
history.provenance: The manuscript was bought by the Russian diplomat Alexandr Orlov in Ethiopia.
history.acquisition: The manuscript was acquired by the Asiatic Museum on 10 September 1903.
